mapper.insert: INSERT INTO export_log (file_name, file_type, file_path, file_size, source_type, source_id, user_id, status, create_time) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE export_log SET file_name=#{fileName}, file_type=#{fileType}, file_path=#{filePath}, file_size=#{fileSize}, source_type=#{sourceType}, source_id=#{sourceId}, user_id=#{userId}, status=#{status}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name, file_type, file_path, file_size, source_type, source_id, user_id, status, create_time FROM export_log WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, file_name, file_type, file_path, file_size, source_type, source_id, user_id, status, create_time FROM export_log ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, file_name, file_type, file_path, file_size, source_type, source_id, user_id, status, create_time FROM export_log WHERE user_id=#{userId}
